review: I will highly recommend her, she is a doctor with empathy. Dr. Shruthi was like God for us during our toughest time during Covid-19. My father and I got covid and my father was badly impacted with pneumonia (70%), hard to breathe without an oxygen mask, and in a danger zone. I was entering the same zone, but contact Dr. Shruthi at the right time where she guided us every day, had call with us and family members to explain the situation. She was very patient explaining all medical terms that we had questions for. During our treatment, she herself became Covid+, but that didn't stop her to give her best to us. Must appreciate her knowledge and expertise in the medical line,  and would highly recommend her.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: You must visit the clinic well in advance as there is a waiting period. Queue movement is slow and takes time for overall registration in the hospital. Dr. Arya listens to all your problems very meticulously and explains what the prognosis and possible causes of symptoms very well. She is very encouraging and to the point. I will surely recommend her. I was very happy with the overall experience.

The doctor should be little gentle with  any kind of query from the patients side . This is the minimum  anyone can expect . We as parents have  a lot of concerns for the children so the doctor should answer with patience and not be rude  in explaining  the cause of visit  or any medicine to the Attendent .

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
I had sudden joint pain, swelling and rashes all over body in night. I took appointment with doctor and she suggested lot of test to run. I sent doctor with reports as she was on leave next day. She asked me to get admitted on urgent basis on seeing my wbc count high without explaining the need and said need to run more tests. In night, they ran few more tests, and full body CT Scan which is very rare, generally it is run in specific body part to conclude on issue as iti s very dangerous to get so much exposure to rays. Again no explanation on why. All test reports came fine as nothing was there. She requested for few more test for which reports are expected after 2 days and nothing to do hospital admission and on my request discharged me as I didn’t see any reason for admission.  I received reports and met doctor again with reports of tests where my viral ebv-vca Antibody to Viral Capsid comes 104 where limit is 20 and wbc improving. She ignored the report *** ***** *** ******* ****** *** *** ** *** ******** ******** *** **** ** **************** * ** ******* **** ****** ** **** ****** *** ***** ** *** *********** ******* ******* ** ******* *** ** ** ****** ***** **** ******. 

I spent 60 k **** ** ********* ** ****** ********  Be aware and take second opinion if doctor ask for admission when she is on leave without explaining the reason. 

I would not recommend this doctor to anyone.

context: Stomach pain and stomach upset,Food Poison,
review: Didn’t feel like I went to doctor. Very ordinary behavior from doctor didn’t even examine patient. Felt like we were talking to some non doctor. Don’t recommend

I have consulted Dr Shruthi for several medical situations for self, family and friends and all of us have found her very approachable, patient, pragmatic and cost effective. Her prescribed medicines treat you slowly and surely and heals you completely and avoids recurrence. *** **** *** ********* *********** ***** ** *** ***** *** The best thing we all loved about her is that she calms your anxiety instantaneously. Thank you Doc for helping us in our downtimes!!
reply_text: Thank you so much Mr. Ravi. I consider myself fortunate to be in a position to relieve someone’s stress and help. My pleasure.

review: The doctor suspected muscular pain or kidney stones. ****** ****** *** ********** ********* **** ******* ********* ** ***** *** **** ** ******** *** ***** **** ****** **** **** ******** ********** *** ******** ***** ******* * *** ***** ** *** ** **** ***** ***** ****** ** *** ***** ***** ** **** ** **** ** *** ***** **** ** ***** **** ********* ********* *** ***** ** ** ***** *** **** I asked the doctor if we should start with medication of muscular pain first and come back to do CT Scan if medication doesn't work. I was scared that it may ne kidney stone.Finally after Rs.8500 spent on the scan, it revealed to be muscular pain. So why was I exposed to radiation? I reported the incident to Manipal Hospital's Management, but they justified the CT Scan. Manipal has a bad reputation for the similar experiences. Would not recommend the doctor as well as the hospital.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Explanation of the health issue,
review: I visited her for stomach ache and other issues, without even paying attention to me  she  turned herself toward monitor and started typing medicines.. for 10 seconds i had to pause to see what is happening. I thought maybe doctor is well experienced but unfortunately it was not the case she prescribed test and medicine **** ****** ***** ***** *** **** ****** ****** ** ***** * ****** *** ************ ********* *** ****** **** *** *** *** **** ******* ** ******* ********* * ** *** **** ******* ** *** ******** ** **** *** **** ***** *** ********** ******** *** *** * **** *** ** ****** ******* ****** ****** ** ******** ********* ***** **** ***** ** **** ******* ** ******** ****** **** **** ******* ************ ***** *****

I visited to consult my wife for knee pain … doctor asked to do some test and X-ray nothing major came out on report … she gave some medicine for vitamin and close the case * *** ******* ***** ***** *** no proper reason investigates of the issue … if only test basis diagnosis we have to do then we don’t require doctor we can self do test and based on report we can take vitamin B12 tablets… everyone have vitamin dificieny now a days …. We will consult different doctor in-future …

High consultation fee  
No  diagnostics test performed for patient for consultation apart from BP and weight check.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: Finally after a long time, we found a doctor that listens to the patient patiently :-).Thanks Dr. Shruti for your consultation. I recommend her positively.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: It was a very experience, the Doctor took immense care and treated online and prescribed required medicine for Covid treatment. Kudos to the Doctor
clearly answers all your queries and very much approachable post consultation also.  very patient and friendly in approach

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: She is very good. Listens patiently and provides appropriate diagnosis. Does not recommend unnecessary tests unless absolutely needed. Quite friendly and approachable. I would surely visit her again if needed.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Doctor Shruti is a great doctor and great human being.She has lot of patience.Normally doctors from Manipal and Columbia only look money n early fIrish consult of a patient but she is gem of a person.she listen you.my father mrn 191558 she helped for Insurance too.she is a great medicine specialist. recommend for all.genuine personality.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: She is approachable, when practo app had issue she immediately connected on WhatsApp. She is very professional- went beyond the issues I had raised. Moreover she was trying to explore various options for my mother's treatment. She cares for her patients. Medicines prescribed worked well. Thank you doctor.
reply_text:
Thank you so much.  
Feel myself fortunate to be able to help.

review: Very authentic and trustable doctor. Her simples advice's worked out for me and am thankfull for this
**** **** ******. helpful in nature with the follow ups. the primary investigation from her end helped a lot.
reply_text: Thank you so much for kind words. So Grateful to be able to help.
